backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new gallery-related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Detailed instructions for local and mainnet deployment using dfx, pnpm, and optional automation script.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/publish-ic.sh: Bash script that builds and deploys backend and frontend canisters to local or IC networks with status output.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing header, sections, and footer into the full single‑page layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Contact section rendering phone, email, location, and hours cards along with a call‑to‑action card.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, services list, and contact details using smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu supporting smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Displays the main hero section with background image, tagline, stats, and buttons that scroll to contact or services.
frontend/src/components/site/ProjectGall: Shows a grid of project images with titles and a modal preview that opens on click.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Lists construction-related services in card format with icons, descriptions, and feature bullets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for handling Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query logic is required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, typography, and background styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using theme CSS variables.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable loading, alias setup, build settings, and a dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, requirements, and needed image assets for a Hindi-language construction company website.
